message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.DS

The paper proposes a recommendation algorithm that fully exploits the similarity information among users and items and intrinsic structural information of the user-item matrix. It constructs two graphs to capture proximity information about users and items and uses manifold learning to constrain the new representation to be smooth on these graphs. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories, including cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
